title.description: Title, or default copy if not. When there is only a title but no description, the font size of the title will be 2 smaller sizes
title.description_zh: 标题，如果没有则为默认文案。当只有标题而没有描述时，标题的字号会小2号

title-slot.description: This property needs to be set when using the title slot, which has been abandoned, and you can use the title slot directly
title-slot.description_zh: 使用 title 插槽时需要设置该属性，已废弃，直接使用title插槽即可

description-slot.description: When using the description slot, you need to set this property, which has been deprecated, and you can use the description slot directly
description-slot.description_zh: 使用 description 插槽时需要设置该属性，已废弃，直接使用description插槽即可

icon-slot.description: This property needs to be set when using the icon slot, which has been deprecated, and you can use the icon slot directly
icon-slot.description_zh: 使用 icon 插槽时需要设置该属性，已废弃，直接使用icon插槽即可
